resources.string: Take the phone and try to guess the word to your partner only by using one word at a time !

Correct proposition : +1 point
False proposition : -1 point
Pass : -5 points 


Click on the screen to start the game !

"
Rules

4 rounds
2 players
4 words per game
" "1 word per round

" "A player guesses a word to another with 4 indices related to the maximum word.

" "Each round, the players change their role.

" "Correct proposition : +1 point
" "False proposition : -1 point
" "Pass : -5 points

" "The game starts with a score of 10 points."

"
Lexify, the mobile game that lexify your vocabulary.

" "Inspired by the game Mot de Passe on France 2, " "Lexify's goal is either to guess a word or to guess a word." "

Mail : lexifyapp@gmail.com

" "Autors: 

 Nassin Khatir
Lucas Nayet
Nicolas Piot"
Your turn, make your team mate guess this word !
It\'s Finished ! You made a total score of :
